pages.heading: Fortuna Extract
pages.text: Increases the yield of some harvested blocks. Also stacks with the Fortune enchantment. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Fortuna Extract L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (1024 blocks)

pages.heading: Fortuna Extract II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate II (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Fortuna Extract XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (4096 blocks)

pages.heading: Fortuna Extract III
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the yield. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate III (256 blocks)
